name: IRFPAI_MOTOR_INFO
description: This table stores the values documented in the IRF-PAI for all the Section GG (Care Tool) admission and discharge items, and Section H items documenting bowel and bladder incontinence.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the abstraction for this row.

columns.name: EATING_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to use suitable utensils to bring food to the mouth and swallow food once the meal is presented on a table/tray (includes modified food consistency) at admission.

columns.name: EATING_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to use suitable utensils to bring food to the mouth and swallow food once the meal is presented on a table/tray (includes modified food consistency).

columns.name: EATING_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to use suitable utensils to bring food to the mouth and swallow food once the meal is presented on a table/tray (includes modified food consistency) at discharge.

columns.name: ORAL_HYGIENE_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to use suitable items to clean teeth, or the ability to remove and replace dentures, if applicable, from and to the mouth, and manage equipment for soaking and rinsing them at admission.

columns.name: ORAL_HYGIENE_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to use suitable items to clean teeth, or the ability to remove and replace dentures, if applicable, from and to the mouth, and manage equipment for soaking and rinsing them.

columns.name: ORAL_HYGIENE_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to use suitable items to clean teeth, or the ability to remove and replace dentures, if applicable, from and to the mouth, and manage equipment for soaking and rinsing them at discharge.

columns.name: TOILET_HYGIENE_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to maintain perineal hygiene, adjust clothes before and after using the toilet, commode, bedpan or urinal, and, if managing an ostomy, includes wiping the opening but not managing equipment at admission.

columns.name: TOILET_HYGIENE_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to maintain perineal hygiene, adjust clothes before and after using the toilet, commode, bedpan or urinal, and, if managing an ostomy, includes wiping the opening but not managing equipment.

columns.name: TOILET_HYGIENE_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to maintain perineal hygiene, adjust clothes before and after using the toilet, commode, bedpan or urinal, and, if managing an ostomy, includes wiping the opening but not managing equipment at discharge.

columns.name: SHOWERBATHE_SELF_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to bathe self in shower or tub, including washing, rinsing, and drying self, but does not include transferring in/out of tub/shower at admission.

columns.name: SHOWERBATHE_SELF_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to bathe self in shower or tub, including washing, rinsing, and drying self, but does not include transferring in/out of tub/shower.

columns.name: SHOWERBATHE_SELF_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to bathe self in shower or tub, including washing, rinsing, and drying self, but does not include transferring in/out of tub/shower at discharge.

columns.name: UPPER_BODY_DRESSING_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to put on and remove shirt or pajama top and includes buttoning, if applicable, at admission.

columns.name: UPPER_BODY_DRESSING_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to put on and remove shirt or pajama top and includes buttoning, if applicable.

columns.name: UPPER_BODY_DRESSING_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to put on and remove shirt or pajama top and includes buttoning, if applicable, at discharge.

columns.name: LOWER_BODY_DRESSING_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to dress and undress below the waist, including fasteners but does not include footwear at admission.

columns.name: LOWER_BODY_DRESSING_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to dress and undress below the waist, including fasteners but does not include footwear.

columns.name: LOWER_BODY_DRESSING_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to dress and undress below the waist, including fasteners but does not include footwear at discharge.

columns.name: PUTTING_FOOTWEAR_ONOFF_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to put on and take off socks and shoes or other footwear that is appropriate for safe mobility at admission.

columns.name: PUTTING_FOOTWEAR_ONOFF_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to put on and take off socks and shoes or other footwear that is appropriate for safe mobility.

columns.name: PUTTING_FOOTWEAR_ONOFF_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to put on and take off socks and shoes or other footwear that is appropriate for safe mobility at discharge.

columns.name: ROLL_LEFT_AND_RIGHT_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to roll from lying on back to the left and right side, and then return to lying on back at admission.

columns.name: ROLL_LEFT_AND_RIGHT_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to roll from lying on back to the left and right side, and then return to lying on back.

columns.name: ROLL_LEFT_AND_RIGHT_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to roll from lying on back to the left and right side, and then return to lying on back at discharge.

columns.name: SIT_TO_LYING_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to move from sitting on the side of bed to lying flat on the bed at admission.

columns.name: SIT_TO_LYING_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to move from sitting on the side of bed to lying flat on the bed.

columns.name: SIT_TO_LYING_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to move from sitting on the side of bed to lying flat on the bed at discharge.

columns.name: LYING_TO_SITTING_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to safely move from lying on the back to sitting on the side of the bed with feet flat on the floor, and with no back support, at admission.

columns.name: LYING_TO_SITTING_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to safely move from lying on the back to sitting on the side of the bed with feet flat on the floor, and with no back support.

columns.name: LYING_TO_SITTING_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to safely move from lying on the back to sitting on the side of the bed with feet flat on the floor, and with no back support, at discharge.

columns.name: SIT_TO_STAND_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to safely come to a standing position from sitting in a chair or on the side of the bed at admission.

columns.name: SIT_TO_STAND_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to safely come to a standing position from sitting in a chair or on the side of the bed.

columns.name: SIT_TO_STAND_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to safely come to a standing position from sitting in a chair or on the side of the bed at discharge.

columns.name: CHAIRBEDTOCHAIR_TRANS_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to safely transfer to and from a bed to a chair (or wheelchair) at admission.

columns.name: CHAIRBEDTOCHAIR_TRANS_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to safely transfer to and from a bed to a chair (or wheelchair).

columns.name: CHAIRBEDTOCHAIR_TRANS_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to safely transfer to and from a bed to a chair (or wheelchair) at discharge.

columns.name: TOILET_TRANS_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to safely get on and off a toilet or commode at admission.

columns.name: TOILET_TRANS_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to safely get on and off a toilet or commode.

columns.name: TOILET_TRANS_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to safely get on and off a toilet or commode at discharge.

columns.name: CAR_TRANS_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to transfer in and out of a car or van on the passenger side and does not include the ability to open/close door or fasten seat belt at admission.

columns.name: CAR_TRANS_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to transfer in and out of a car or van on the passenger side and does not include the ability to open/close door or fasten seat belt.

columns.name: CAR_TRANS_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to transfer in and out of a car or van on the passenger side and does not include the ability to open/close door or fasten seat belt at discharge.

columns.name: WALK_10_FEET_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to, once standing, walk at least 10 feet in a corridor or similar space at admission.

columns.name: WALK_10_FEET_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to, once standing, walk at least 10 feet in a corridor or similar space.

columns.name: WALK_10_FEET_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to, once standing, walk at least 10 feet in a corridor or similar space at discharge.

columns.name: WALK_50_FT_2TURNS_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to, once standing, walk at least 50 feet and make two turns at admission.

columns.name: WALK_50_FT_2TURNS_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to, once standing, walk at least 50 feet and make two turns.

columns.name: WALK_50_FT_2TURNS_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to, once standing, walk at least 50 feet and make two turns at discharge.

columns.name: WALK_150_FT_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to, once standing, walk at least 150 feet in a corridor or similar space at admission.

columns.name: WALK_150_FT_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to, once standing, walk at least 150 feet in a corridor or similar space.

columns.name: WALK_150_FT_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to, once standing, walk at least 150 feet in a corridor or similar space at discharge.

columns.name: WALK_10_FT_UNEVEN_SURF_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to walk 10 feet on uneven or sloping surfaces, such as grass or gravel, at admission.

columns.name: WALK_10_FT_UNEVEN_SURF_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to walk 10 feet on uneven or sloping surfaces, such as grass or gravel.

columns.name: WALK_10_FT_UNEVEN_SURF_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to walk 10 feet on uneven or sloping surfaces, such as grass or gravel, at discharge.

columns.name: ONE_STEP_CURB_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to step over a curb or up and down one step at admission.

columns.name: ONE_STEP_CURB_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to step over a curb or up and down one step.

columns.name: ONE_STEP_CURB_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to step over a curb or up and down one step at discharge.

columns.name: FOUR_STEPS_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to go up and down four steps with or without a rail at admission.

columns.name: FOUR_STEPS_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to go up and down four steps with or without a rail.

columns.name: FOUR_STEPS_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to go up and down four steps with or without a rail at discharge.

columns.name: TWELVE_STEPS_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to go up and down 12 steps with or without a rail at admission.

columns.name: TWELVE_STEPS_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to go up and down 12 steps with or without a rail.

columns.name: TWELVE_STEPS_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to go up and down 12 steps with or without a rail at discharge.

columns.name: PICK_UP_OBJECT_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to bend/stoop from a standing position to pick up a small object, such as a spoon, from the floor at admission.

columns.name: PICK_UP_OBJECT_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to bend/stoop from a standing position to pick up a small object, such as a spoon, from the floor.

columns.name: PICK_UP_OBJECT_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to bend/stoop from a standing position to pick up a small object, such as a spoon, from the floor at discharge.

columns.name: USES_WHEELCHAIR_SCOOTR_ADMSN_C
columns.description: Indicates if the resident uses a wheelchair/scooter at admission.

columns.name: USES_WHEELCHAIR_SCOOTR_DISCH_C
columns.description: Indicates if the resident uses a wheelchair/scooter at discharge.

columns.name: WHEEL_50_FT_2TURNS_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to, once seated in wheelchair/scooter, wheel at least 50 feet and make two turns at admission.

columns.name: WHEEL_50_FT_2TURNS_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to, once seated in wheelchair/scooter, wheel at least 50 feet and make two turns.

columns.name: WHEEL_50_FT_2TURNS_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to, once seated in wheelchair/scooter, wheel at least 50 feet and make two turns at discharge.

columns.name: WHEEL_50_FT_2TURNS_TYP_ADMSN_C
columns.description: Indicates the type of wheelchair/scooter used to wheel 50 feet with two turns at admission.

columns.name: WHEEL_50_FT_2TURNS_TYP_DISCH_C
columns.description: Indicates the type of wheelchair/scooter used to wheel 50 feet with two turns at discharge.

columns.name: WHEEL_150_FT_ADMSN_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to, once seated in wheelchair/scooter, wheel at least 150 feet in a corridor or similar space at admission.

columns.name: WHEEL_150_FT_GOAL_C
columns.description: This element indicates the discharge goal of the ability to, once seated in wheelchair/scooter, wheel at least 150 feet in a corridor or similar space.

columns.name: WHEEL_150_FT_DISCH_C
columns.description: This element measures the ability to, once seated in wheelchair/scooter, wheel at least 150 feet in a corridor or similar space at discharge.

columns.name: WHEEL_150_FT_TYP_ADMSN_C
columns.description: Indicates the type of wheelchair/scooter used to wheel 150 feet at admission.

columns.name: WHEEL_150_FT_TYP_DISCH_C
columns.description: Indicates the type of wheelchair/scooter used to wheel 150 feet at discharge.

columns.name: BLADDER_CONTINENCE_C
columns.description: Indicates level of bladder continence at admission.

columns.name: BOWEL_CONTINENCE_C
columns.description: Indicates level of bowel continence at admission.

columns.name: MOTOR_SCORE
columns.description: The total motor score for a patient based on mobility and self care assessments.
